name: Super Soakers & Hell
description:
You find yourself armed with a holy-water filled super soaker and there are demons. Platform and shoot demons to reach the end where a boss awaits you.

Features:

-Multiple Enemy Types

-Custom Soundtrack by wyatt. https://soundcloud.com/user-877764655

-Final Boss

Completed in less than 48 hours for the UCF GDK Staycation Game Jam.
